verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song.) God <S%H430><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> in Judah; <S%H3063><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And His tabernacle <S%H5520><s%> is in Salem; <S%H8004><s%> His dwelling <S%H4585><s%> place <S%H4585><s%> also is in Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> He broke <S%H7665><s%> the flaming <S%H7565><s%> arrows, <S%H7198><s%> The shield, <S%H4043><s%> and the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the weapons <S%H4421><s%> of war. <S%H4421><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Thou art resplendent, <S%H215><s%> More <S%H4480><s%> majestic <S%H117><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of prey. <S%H2964><s%>

The stouthearted <S%H47><s%> <S%H3820><s%> were plundered; <S%H7997><s%> They sank <S%H5123><s%> into sleep; <S%H8142><s%> And none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the warriors <S%H2428><s%> <S%H376><s%> could use <S%H4672><s%> his hands. <S%H3027><s%>
At Thy rebuke, <S%H1606><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Both rider <S%H7393><s%> and horse <S%H5483><s%> were cast <S%H7290><s%> into a dead <S%H7290><s%> sleep. <S%H7290><s%>
Thou, even Thou, art to be feared; <S%H3372><s%> And who <S%H4310><s%> may stand <S%H5975><s%> in Thy presence <S%H6440><s%> when <S%H4480><s%> once <S%H9241><s%> Thou art angry <S%H639><s%>?
Thou didst cause judgment <S%H1779><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> feared, <S%H3372><s%> and was still, <S%H8252><s%>
When God <S%H430><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> to judgment, <S%H4941><s%> To save <S%H3467><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the humble <S%H6035><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
For the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee; With a remnant <S%H7611><s%> of wrath <S%H2534><s%> Thou shalt gird <S%H2296><s%> Thyself.

Make <S%H5087><s%> vows <S%H5087><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and fulfill <S%H9608><s%> [them]; Let all <S%H3605><s%> who are around <S%H5439><s%> Him bring <S%H2986><s%> gifts <S%H7862><s%> to Him who <S%H4172><s%> is to be feared. <S%H4172><s%>
He will cut <S%H1219><s%> off <S%H1219><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of princes; <S%H5057><s%> He is feared <S%H3372><s%> by the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
